verses.verse: Man <S%H120><s%>, that is <S%H3205>born<s%> of a <S%H802>woman<s%>, Is of <S%H7116>few<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, and <S%H7649>full<s%> of <S%H7267>trouble<s%>.
He cometh <S%H3318>forth<s%> like a <S%H6731>flower<s%>, and is cut <S%H5243>down<s%>: He <S%H1272>fleeth<s%> also as a <S%H6738>shadow<s%>, and continueth <S%H5975>not<s%>.
And dost thou <S%H6491>open<s%> thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> upon such a <S%H2088>one<s%>, And <S%H935>bringest<s%> me into judgment with <S%H4941>thee<s%>?
Who can <S%H5414>bring<s%> a <S%H2889>clean<s%> thing out of an <S%H2931>unclean<s%>? not <S%H259>one<s%>.

Seeing <S%H518><s%> his <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H2782>determined<s%>, The <S%H4557>number<s%> of his <S%H2320>months<s%> is with <S%H6213>thee<s%>, And thou hast appointed his <S%H2706>bounds<s%> that he cannot <S%H5674>pass<s%>;
Look <S%H8159><s%> away from <S%H2308>him<s%>, that he may rest, Till he shall <S%H7521>accomplish<s%>, as a <S%H7916>hireling<s%>, his <S%H3117>day<s%>.

For there <S%H3426>is<s%> <S%H8615>hope<s%> of a <S%H6086>tree<s%>, If it be cut <S%H3772>down<s%>, that it will sprout <S%H2498>again<s%>, And that the tender <S%H3127>branch<s%> thereof will not <S%H2308>cease<s%>.
Though the <S%H8328>root<s%> thereof wax <S%H2204>old<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%>, And the <S%H1503>stock<s%> thereof <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H6083>ground<s%>;
Yet through the <S%H7381>scent<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> it will <S%H6524>bud<s%>, And put <S%H6213>forth<s%> <S%H7105>boughs<s%> like a <S%H5194>plant<s%>.
But <S%H1397>man<s%> <S%H4191>dieth<s%>, and is laid <S%H2522>low<s%>: <S%H120>Yea<s%>, man giveth up the <S%H1478>ghost<s%>, and where is he?
As the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H235>fail<s%> from the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, And the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H2717>wasteth<s%> and drieth <S%H3001>up<s%>;

So <S%H376>man<s%> lieth <S%H7901>down<s%> and <S%H6965>riseth<s%> <S%H8064>not<s%>: Till the heavens be no <S%H1115>more<s%>, they shall not <S%H6974>awake<s%>, Nor be roused <S%H5782>out<s%> of their <S%H8142>sleep<s%>.

Oh <S%H5414>that<s%> thou wouldest <S%H6845>hide<s%> me in <S%H7585>Sheol<s%>, That thou wouldest keep me <S%H5641>secret<s%>, until thy <S%H639>wrath<s%> be <S%H7725>past<s%>, That thou wouldest <S%H7896>appoint<s%> me a set <S%H2706>time<s%>, and remember <S%H2142>me<s%>!

If a <S%H1397>man<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%>, shall he <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H3117>again<s%>? All the days of my <S%H6635>warfare<s%> would I <S%H3176>wait<s%>, Till my <S%H2487>release<s%> should <S%H935>come<s%>.
Thou wouldest <S%H7121>call<s%>, and I would <S%H6030>answer<s%> <S%H3700>thee<s%>: Thou wouldest have a desire to the <S%H4639>work<s%> of thy <S%H3027>hands<s%>.
But now thou <S%H5608>numberest<s%> my <S%H6806>steps<s%>: Dost thou not <S%H8104>watch<s%> over my <S%H2403>sin<s%>?
My <S%H6588>transgression<s%> is sealed <S%H2856>up<s%> in a <S%H6872>bag<s%>, And thou fastenest <S%H2950>up<s%> mine <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>.
But <S%H199><s%> the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H5307>falling<s%> cometh to <S%H5034>nought<s%>; And the <S%H6697>rock<s%> is <S%H6275>removed<s%> out of its <S%H4725>place<s%>;

The <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H7833>wear<s%> the <S%H68>stones<s%>; The overflowings thereof wash <S%H7857>away<s%> <S%H5599>the<s%> <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>: So thou <S%H6>destroyest<s%> the <S%H8615>hope<s%> of <S%H582>man<s%>.
Thou <S%H8630>prevailest<s%> for <S%H5331>ever<s%> against <S%H1980>him<s%>, and he passeth; Thou <S%H8138>changest<s%> his <S%H6440>countenance<s%>, and sendest him <S%H7971>away<s%>.
His <S%H1121>sons<s%> come to <S%H3513>honor<s%>, and he <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> it <S%H6819>not<s%>; And they are brought low, but he perceiveth it not of <S%H995>them<s%>.
But his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> upon him hath <S%H3510>pain<s%>, And his <S%H5315>soul<s%> within him <S%H56>mourneth<s%>.
